name: Only Hugh Can Prevent Forest Fires
name_original: Only Hugh Can Prevent Forest Fires
description:
Only Hugh Can Prevent Forest Fires

Use WASD to move around, E to interact

Douse all the fires, but beware. The trees will block the water stream. Fortunately, Hugh has a quad the he can use to pull the logs out of the stream, and a small gas station nearby to keep the quad fueled and running.

Have fun
